short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon restores the forums removed from IMDb and you can continue posting to them on filmboards.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a forum teaser of the message boards archived at filmboards.com. Not affiliated with imdb.com.
